code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[loggedIn,setLoggedIn]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoggedIn(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),!loggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-success",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Password:"})," ",password]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Login successful!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Product",children:"Go to Products"})]})]});};export default Login;
